features.title: Ease of Use
features.description: Attendance is taken for classes using either a QR-Code or a Code off a student's device.

features.title: Performant
features.description: Application's API utilising a combination of MongoDB & Hono leading to overall high performance queries.

features.title: Personalise
features.description: CRUD Tools available within the application for administrators and individuals with access control authority.

features.title: Analytics
features.description: Analytical features for all access control authority levels to showcase deep analysis of attendance etc.

features.title: Mobile UI
features.description: Built from the ground up with mobile support in mind as mobile devices would be used most for the website.

features.title: Codebase
features.description: Codebase was designed with good OOP principles as well as relevant design patterns.

projects.name: Bank API
projects.description: Built for a group university project replicating a banking system

features.title: ASP.NET
features.description: Demonstrates my ability to effectively build APIs using ASP.NET Web API, highlighting backend development skills.

features.title: Structured
features.description: Project is structered with distinct folders for each such as Models, reflecting a organised codebase enhancing maintainability.

features.title: X-Platform
features.description: Instructions provided for local usage on multiple platforms as different settings are required for each.

features.title: Instructions
features.description: Detailed instructions on how to setup the project as well as what each endpoint of the API does.

features.title: Secure
features.description: HTTPS is built-in to the APIs operation to ensure no snooping or other penetration methods are avoided.

features.title: Async
features.description: Built with scalability and responsiveness in mind to ensure the ability of rapid expandability.

projects.name: Tetris Game
projects.description: Second year university project utilising c-sharp

features.title: Console
features.description: Built with-in the console, providing a test-based gaming experience to the user.

features.title: Tracking
features.description: Implementation of a scoring system to keep track of the users performance, enhancing competitiveness.

features.title: Collisions
features.description: Object collision detection ensures accurate piece placement and game mechanics alike the original.

features.title: Boundaries
features.description: Developed out-of-bounds detection to prevent pieces from moving beyond the playable area, maintaining game integrity.

features.title: C-Sharp
features.description: Utilized C# to develop the game, demonstrating a strong background within this programming language.

features.title: Uni-Project
features.description: Developed as part of my second-year assignment, reflecting academic growth and application of new concepts learnt.

projects.name: Messaging App
projects.description: Second Year Undergraduate University Project for the Java Course

features.title: Interleaved
features.description: The application utilizes a multithreaded approach to handle multiple clients simultaneously, ensuring efficient and responsive communication.

features.title: Protocol
features.description: Implements the Publish/Subscribe messaging pattern, facilitating structured and readable data exchange with the use of the JSON format.

features.title: Dynamic
features.description: Users can manage their subscriptions dynamically with commands to list available channels, subscribe, unsubscribe and view current subscriptions.

features.title: Selection
features.description: Active Channel Selection provides the functionality to select and display the active communication channel, allowing users to focus their interactions.

features.title: Searching
features.description: Users can retrieve all messages they've published and search for specific keywords within subscribed channels, enhancing management capabilities.

features.title: Menu
features.description: Offers a command menu that displayed all available commands, improving user experience by providing accessible guidance on application functionalities.
